message: Hello! This is a rare opportunity to buy a product that I can assure you is of exceptional quality. I've just started selling, and I want to establish a strong reputation. I'm confident that this product will meet your expectations. Don't miss out on this chance to get a high-quality product for $10000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your confidence, I'd like to see some evidence of the quality of your products before committing to a purchase. I'll wait to see how other buyers respond before making a decision.  Good luck with your business!
